attributes.action: Avoid pay per mile road charges
attributes.additional_details: Pay per mile will disadvantage people who have no other choice than to use their cars due to lack of suitable alternatives ,eg rural areas
attributes.background: Drop the idea of pay per mile road charges and find a suitable alternative for electric vehicles and keep the current system for all ICE vehicles

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560867
